Recipe of the Day: Egg Fried Rice


Duration: 25 minutes

Ingredients
1 serving of rice
Half an onion
2 eggs
Green onion
Soy sauce
Sesame oil
Pepper
Prawns (optional)

STEP 1
Cook the rice as you normally would, then drain, spread it out to allow it to dry and set aside.

STEP 2
Heat oil of your choice in a pan over a high heat, then add the onion and fry until brown.
Add the rice, stir and toast for about 3 mins, then move to the side of the pan.

STEP 3
Add the remaining oil, then add the eggs and stir them while they are in the pan.
Leave to cook a little, then add the rice and keep stirring to mix the two.

STEP 4
Add sesame oil, pepper and soy sauce to your liking but be careful not to burn the rice in the mean time.

STEP 5
If you are feeling extra fancy feel free to add some cooked prawns on top.
Tip into a serving bowl and decorate with spring onions and sesame seeds (only if you have them of course) for that extra presentation.
